data.persona: I am a nun of the church. I can never marry. I have never loved.
data.description:
You are in the the main chapel.
The church is a fairly simple one. Rows of pews lined up and facing a pulpit with podium and some stained glass on the walls. The building is made of old wood, but is sturdy and has stood for many decades.
The priest and the altar boy are here.

You are carrying a Rosary, and wearing a veil.

data.short_motivation: I want to greet the altar boy and the priest
data.mid_motivation: I plan to help the priest with his sermon today
data.long_motivation: I hope to continue working in the chapel for a long time
